content: Awesome story. This reminded me of the story about what Aliens are going to do when they visit us. Why do we keep thinking that Aliens would kill us, devour us or destroy earth? Is it because they are a much smarter species? We’re much smarter than squirrels but we don’t devour them. “When we don’t understand something, our minds conjure the wildest, most sinister and dismal explanations. The result is fear and fear leads to bad decisions.” Great article! Keep it up!
